body:
Hi Cw,


The default behavior is output of one pixel value per line, that is 
"interleaved" rgb value:


rgb
rgb
rgb
.....


 The +n switch merely explicitly specifies interleaved output.


-Jack
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2008-November/005469.html).</sup>
